title: MomentsActionMessage
description: A template for messages that execute moments page actions.

bucket_id.description: A bucket identifier for the addon. This is used in order to anonymize telemetry for history-sensitive targeting.

action.description: Additional data provided as argument when executing the action

url.description: URL data to be used as argument to the action

expireDelta.description: Expiration timestamp to be used as argument to the action

expire.description: Timestamp in ms when the message should expire

action.description: Optional action to take in addition to showing the notification
